funds.name: Vanguard Total Stock Market ETF
funds.description: VTI tracks the CRSP US Total Market Index, providing exposure to the entire U.S. equity market, including small-, mid-, and large-cap growth and value stocks.
keyFacts: Covers nearly 4,000 stocks
Suitable for investors seeking broad U.S. market exposure
One of the largest ETFs by assets under management (AUM)
Core holding for diversified U.S. equity exposure

funds.name: Vanguard S&P 500 ETF
funds.description: VOO tracks the S&P 500 Index, representing 500 of the largest U.S. companies, covering about 75% of the U.S. stock market capitalization.
keyFacts: One of the most popular ETFs for large-cap U.S. stocks
Offers broad exposure to the U.S. economy's largest companies
Historically difficult to beat by active funds
Strong performance aligned with S&P 500 gains

funds.name: Vanguard Total International Stock ETF
funds.description: VXUS tracks the FTSE Global All Cap ex US Index, providing exposure to both developed and emerging international markets outside the U.S.
keyFacts: Covers thousands of stocks across 40+ countries
Diversifies portfolio internationally
For investors seeking global equity diversification beyond the U.S.
Includes both developed and emerging markets
funds.indexTracked: FTSE Global All Cap ex US Index

funds.name: SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust
funds.description: SPY is the oldest and largest ETF tracking the S&P 500 Index, launched in 1993 with a long track record.
keyFacts: Launched in 1993, it has a long track record
One of the most liquid ETFs in the world
Strong historical performance, outperforming many active funds since inception
2024 return approximately 27.7%

funds.name: Invesco QQQ Trust
funds.description: QQQ tracks the Nasdaq-100 Index, focusing on the 100 largest non-financial companies listed on Nasdaq, heavily weighted toward technology.
keyFacts: Growth-oriented fund with heavy tech sector exposure
Focuses on 100 largest non-financial Nasdaq companies
2024 return about 25.6%
Popular choice for technology sector exposure

funds.name: Fidelity 500 Index Fund
funds.description: FXAIX tracks the S&P 500 Index, similar to VOO and SPY, but as a mutual fund with extremely low costs.
keyFacts: Very low expense ratio at 0.015%
No minimum investment
Suitable for investors preferring mutual funds over ETFs
One of the lowest-cost S&P 500 funds available

funds.name: Schwab S&P 500 Index Fund
funds.description: Mutual fund tracking the S&P 500 Index with an extremely low expense ratio and strong track record since 1997.
keyFacts: Extremely low expense ratio at 0.02%
No minimum investment
Strong track record since 1997
Investor-friendly product from Charles Schwab

funds.name: Vanguard Growth Index Fund
funds.description: Tracks the CRSP US Large Cap Growth Index, focusing on large U.S. companies with higher growth potential, such as technology and consumer services.
keyFacts: Growth-oriented alternative to broad market funds
One of the best performers in 2024 with a 34.2% return
Focuses on large-cap growth companies
Higher growth potential with moderate risk
funds.indexTracked: CRSP US Large Cap Growth Index

funds.name: Vanguard Small Cap Index Fund
funds.description: Tracks small-cap U.S. stocks, providing diversification into smaller companies with potentially higher growth prospects.
keyFacts: Tracks small-cap U.S. stocks
Good for diversification into smaller companies
Higher growth potential with increased volatility
Complements large-cap holdings

funds.name: Vanguard Total Bond Market Index Fund
funds.description: Tracks U.S. investment-grade bonds, providing fixed income diversification and stability to balance equity holdings.
keyFacts: Tracks U.S. investment-grade bonds
Provides fixed income diversification
Lower volatility than stocks
Important component of balanced portfolios

funds.name: Fidelity ZERO Large Cap Index
funds.description: Tracks large-cap U.S. stocks with zero expense ratio, making it one of the most cost-effective investment options available.
keyFacts: Zero expense ratio - completely free
No minimum investment
Attractive for cost-conscious investors
Tracks large-cap U.S. stocks
